text:
@AhmedBaba_ Cases aside, Florida still has only 3,300 total deaths. @NYGovCuomo killed twice this amount just in #NursingHomes.  Let's not pretend #Democrat leaders who have had strict #lockdowns are doing anything right.

#LiberalHypocrisy 
#coronavirus 
#NursingHomeSlaughter 
#KillerCuomo
